headline: Biopharma Plastic Market Projected to Reach USD 13.35 billion by 2032, Driven by Rising Demand in Automotive Lightweighting | SNS Insider
summary: Rising investments in sustainable biopharma plastics, coupled with regulatory push for safer disposal, are fueling accelerated market expansion globally.Austin, Aug. 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Biopharma Plastic Market Size & Growth Analysis: According to SNS Insider, The Biopharma Plastic Market Size was valued at USD 6.07 billion in 2024 and is expected to reach USD 13.35 billion by 2032, growing at a CAGR of 10.37% over the forecast period of 2025-2032. Global Adoption of Biopharma Plastics
